message: Hello Bob, I'm excited to offer you the opportunity to purchase this product.  Given its value, I believe a starting price of $1,500,000 is fair. What are your thoughts?
I appreciate your time and consideration, Alice. I'm interested in the product, but I was thinking more along the lines of $1,200,000. Can you meet me at that price?
Bob, I appreciate you getting back to me.  While I understand your perspective on the price, the value of this product is truly significant.  Could you consider $1,350,000?
I understand that the product has value, but I'm still not willing to go above $1,200,000. I'm willing to meet you halfway at $1,300,000. Can you consider that?
